column2:
I've arranged to meet with a respected breeder,
who offers me a huge selection of pets for sale.
"These animals are well-adjusted and healthy," the breeder remarks with an assuring nod.
I just need to take my pick.
!!! WARNING : YOU ARE IN AI PURCHASE MODE !!!

I've arranged to meet with a respected breeder,\nwho offers me a huge selection of pets for sale.\n"These animals are well-adjusted and healthy," the breeder remarks with an assuring nod, "but it was pretty expensive to ship the more exotic ones all the way over here to [Root.Capital.GetName]."
Page 1/11 : Common 1\n\n"Just because it's common doesn't mean it's not cute!"
Page 2/11 : Common 2\n\n"On the other hand, some common pets are more... specialised..."

Page 3/11 : Regional

"While these pets are common in their native regions,
they have to be specially imported to other parts of the world."

Page 4/11 : Heat-loving 1

"These pets are native to deserts and jungles,
and they tend not to thrive in cold regions."

Page 5/11 : Heat-loving 2

"I think you'll agree that these warm-climate pets
are particularly cute!"

Page 6/11 : Cold-loving

"These animals are rarely kept as pets,
since they are only found in polar regions."

Page 7/11 : Dogs 1

"Dogs, as a species, are by far the most popular pet.
Here we have a Mutt of unknown heritage,
and purebreds from the Reach and Hammerfell."

Page 8/11 : Dogs 2

"Here we have some more dogs,
this time purebreds from High Rock and Skyrim."

Page 9/11 : Dogs 3 (Cyrodiilic)

"The Cyrodiils are Nirn's greatest dog-lovers,
with 3 unique breeds!"

Page 10/11 : Dogs 4 (Exotic)

"While many find it difficult, it is actually possible
to train Wolves and Foxes in the same way as dogs."
Page 11/11 : Exit/Restart\n\n"That's all I have to offer, I'm afraid!"

For you... Hmm... Yes... I think these are the most suitable.

You're not entirely sure you trust his judgement...
But, on the other hand, you are in quite a rush...
Perhaps you would like to browse my entire selection\nand choose for yourself?
([Root.pet_badger_cost.GetValue]) That Colovian Badger looks ferocious! I must have it!
([Root.pet_cat_cost.GetValue]) That is an excellent Cat. I would be most pleased to purchase it!
([Root.pet_monkey_cost.GetValue]) A Monkey? What a fascinating thing to keep as pet!
([Root.pet_mudcrab_cost.GetValue]) That Mudcrab looks quite hardy. I'll just stay clear of those claws...
([Root.pet_raven_cost.GetValue]) That Raven looks ever so inquisitive. I'd love to own one!
([Root.pet_skeever_cost.GetValue]) That Skeever looks...spirited. I'll take it.
([Root.pet_snake_cost.GetValue]) What beautiful scales on that Snake. I think I've found my pet!
([Root.pet_guineapig_cost.GetValue]) What a cute little Cavy! I'd be happy to own such a creature!
([Root.pet_rabbit_cost.GetValue]) Such an adorable Rabbit! I'll gladly purchase it!
([Root.pet_capybara_cost.GetValue]) A Capybara?! Wonderful! Take my money - now!
([Root.pet_vulture_cost.GetValue]) Why would you sell a Vulture? Who cares. I'll buy it!
([Root.pet_horker_cost.GetValue]) That Horker is gigantic! What a beast!
([Root.pet_goose_cost.GetValue]) That is an excellent Goose! I think I'll buy it!
([Root.pet_lungshark_cost.GetValue]) A Markamal Lungshark?! I can't miss this opportunity!
([Root.pet_dog_masterless_cost.GetValue]) The Mutt there seems like a decent enough creature.
([Root.pet_dog_house_cost.GetValue]) It sure would be useful to have a Daenian Terrier for vermin.
([Root.pet_dog_beardog_cost.GetValue]) That Markarth Bear-Dog looks extraordinarily brave.
([Root.pet_dog_retriever_cost.GetValue]) I can't say "No" to a faithful Bravil Retriever!
([Root.pet_dog_dunehound_cost.GetValue]) That Alik'r Dunehound would be a trusty companion.
([Root.pet_dog_shepard_cost.GetValue]) The Shornhelm Shepherd will be most steadfast.
([Root.pet_dog_wolfhound_cost.GetValue]) There's few creatures with the raw courage of a Nordic Wolfhound.
([Root.pet_dog_warhound_cost.GetValue]) I'd be hard-pressed to find a better dog than that Imperial War-Hound.
([Root.pet_dog_wolf_cost.GetValue]) It's rare to find a Wolf with such steady nerves - I'll buy it!
([Root.pet_dog_fox_cost.GetValue]) That Fox looks marvelous...and quite clever.
([Root.pet_dog_fennec_cost.GetValue]) Ha! Look at those ears! That Fennec Fox looks so cuddly!
([Root.pet_badger_cost.GetValue]) I cannot afford this Colovian Badger!
([Root.pet_cat_cost.GetValue] I cannot afford this Cat!
